'''Passage's Appetizing Lamp''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Passage's Appetizing Lamp is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Fontaine]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in [["A Very Warm Place"]] after solving a nearby prism and orb puzzle. The chest is under a breakable brown rubble pile and does not react to the treasure compass when hidden.
